sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_ff2960a3db7d7b0019565d50cf96195e
sys_update_xml.payload: customc.ep-blocks-wrapper{ padding: 0 8em; } @media all and (max-width: 1100px) { .ep-blocks-wrapper{ padding: 0 !important; } } @media all and (max-width: 1100px) { .ep-blocks-wrapper{ padding: 0; } } @media all and (min-width: 500px) and (max-width: 900px) { .ep-blocks-wrapper{ padding: 0 3em; } } @media all and (min-width: 991px) and (max-width: 1135px) { .chat-wrapper{ height: 145px !important; } .ep-icon{ i{ line-height: 116px !important; } } } @media all and (min-width: 1136px) and (max-width: 1358px) { .chat-wrapper{ height: 110px !important; } .ep-icon{ i{ line-height: 81px !important; } } } .chat-wrapper{ background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(39, 37, 41, 0.94), rgba(48, 45, 51, 0.94)); margin-bottom: 1em; } .ep-content{ padding: 11px 14px; padding-left: 75px; } .block-header{ font-family: $font-banner-text; font-size:1.3em; color:#fff; letter-spacing:0.05em; } .block-desc{ color: darken(#fff,10%); height: 38px; } .ep-icon{ display: inline-block; color: #FFFFFF; border-radius: 2px; padding: 14.5px; text-align: center; position: absolute; z-index: 100; i{ font-size: 30px; line-height: 58px; width: 38px; //height: 38px; } } .ep-icon-color{ background: linear-gradient(60deg, $brand-primary, lighten($brand-primary,6%)); // box-shadow: 0 12px 20px -10px rgba(0, 188, 212, 0.28), 0 4px 20px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 7px 8px -5px rgba(0, 188, 212, 0.2); } .ep-pop-content{ margin-top: .5em; } .ep-anime-delay-1s{ animation-delay: 1s; } sp_instanceBlock menus for Home Pagetrueep-home-blocks-v2falseEP-Home Blocks V2falsefalsesp_widgetRV2019-06-08 14:39:36ff2960a3db7d7b0019565d50cf96195e0EP-Home Blocks V2globalglobalsp_widget_ff2960a3db7d7b0019565d50cf96195eRV2019-06-08 14:39:36
